attributes.additional_details:
Diabetes type II is clinically proven to be reversible/curable/preventable by diet.

Even as late as March 1911, a Newcastle-upon Tyne Medical University carried out a trial to demonstrate this
There are several other studies using effectively the same methodology with the same results.

As it is costing the NHS some £1m per minute to deal with diabetes, this begs several questions.
Upon reflection, the answers are obvious.

Countrywide clinics could be established, with dedicated doctors,clinicians, dieticians, nutritionists & nurses allocated.
